er.translation[0].definitions[0].definit: a sound you make when you do not know exactly what to say next
er.translation[0].definitions[0].example: Well, er – I’m not really sure.
er.translation[1].definitions[0].definit: forms the comparative of many short adjectives and adverbs
er.translation[2].definitions[0].definit: someone who does something or is doing something
er.translation[2].definitions[1].example: a scraper  (=a tool you use for scraping)
